tweet: We are delighted to announce that the paper “On the Fairness of DLTs for the Internet of Things” has been accepted to the Poster track of #IEEE International Conference on Blockchain and Cryptocurrency (ICBC 2020):  https://t.co/tXJsB2Ic01 #IOTA @IEEEorg

Research Status Update - Check the latest news about #Coordicide, including the Lisbon Summit, GoShimmer Implementation, dRNG, Autopeering & other updates from our Research Groups:  https://t.co/KaErXzewT0 #IOTA

An #IOTA-based reverse power switch: The contraption looks up the #Tangle address displayed which determines how long electricity is passed thru the plug. If your account is depleted: No more power :)  @oostech_hh & @iotashop at @SoftwareAG #Vienna.  More details in our #MeetUp!  https://t.co/QLyjk5NVmI

And the papers “Implementation Study of Two Verifiable Delay Functions” & “Parasite Chain Detection in the #IOTA Protocol” have been accepted for publication and presentation at the 2nd #Tokenomics on Blockchain Economics, Security and Protocols:  https://t.co/xylO5Lw39N

Looking forward to our inaugural @Tangle_EE session next Wednesday (March 18th) with @DomSchiener, @navinram999 & Axel from the #IF, Paul Buck & Sharon Corbet from @EclipseFdn, and all the members, of course :)  We'll focus on our internal structure first, tech will follow! #IOTA

#IOTA Lisbon Summit! Dig this: "with most Cordicide questions answered and a large number of its components well specified, it was time to discuss in detail how our research is to become the Coordicide," by Dr. Popov:    https://t.co/9hglX7U2ZS

The original #Qubic idea had hard to overcome problems. The #IOTA protocol was, in fact, created to help solve those problems. IOTA was designed to become the global standard for #IoT messaging & payments. Qubic follows that standard, & is made possible by fee-free transactions!  https://t.co/0HSwmb1xSz

The goal for #IOTA is it to achieve adoption of the protocol & establish IOTA as the main currency for machines. Being headquartered & regulated in an environment which enables & further accelerates this adoption is of utmost importance. #Germany offers the right environment!  https://t.co/vWtXVTPxDK
